text: Some PRRs, such as NACHT, LRR, and PYD domains-containing protein 1 (NLRP1), NLRP3, NLR family CARD domain-containing protein 4 (NLRC4), and absent in melanoma 2 (AIM2), recruit apoptosis-associated speck-like protein (ASC) and caspase-1 to form the inflammasome-a multimeric platform of proteins that initiates inflammation as well as some forms of cell death (3) . Among all the inflammasomes discovered, the NLRP3 inflammasome is the most extensively studied and it plays an important role in both inflammation and antiviral responses.
